1,000 Arboreal Warriors.name: 树栖战士 1,000 Arboreal Warriors
1,000 Arboreal Warriors.description:
你让一群无数的木制树战士从地面升起，冲锋并刺穿你的敌人，然后要么扎根成为树木，要么分散去攻击更多的敌人。这些战士在一个爆发区域内出现，该区域是一个以120英尺内的某点为中心、半径为20英尺的爆发区域。区域内的敌人会受到16d6穿刺伤害，需要进行一次基础反射豁免。 @Template[type:burst|distance:4] @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

选择播种或收割。

  • 播种： 战士们扎根并变成树木。你在该区域播种，种植的树木可以提供标准掩护。
  • 收割：你收割附近植物的能量，让你的战士们冲向远处的敌人。伤害增加到16d8穿刺伤害。对于你在区域内收割植物的每个格子，一个战士会冲向该区域外但在距离该区域200英尺内的不同敌人，那个敌人会根据其基础反射豁免受到这个力量的伤害。一个单独的敌人只能从这个力量中受到一次伤害。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[piercing]]

等级（+1）： 伤害增加1d6，如果选择收割则增加1d8。

Absolute Zero.name: 绝对零度 Absolute Zero
Absolute Zero.description:
你将完美的寒冷注入一个生物的身体，使其动作完全停止。选择一个90英尺内的生物。目标生物受到18d6寒冷伤害，具体效果取决于其基础强韧豁免。 @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[cold]] @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

大成功： 生物不受影响。

成功： 生物受到一半伤害，处于冻结2状态，并在1轮内被减缓1。 @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 2}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}

失败： 生物受到全部伤害，处于冻结3状态，在1轮内被减缓2，然后在下一轮被减缓1。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 3}

大失败：生物受到双倍伤害，处于冻结4状态，在1轮内被减缓3，然后在下一轮被减缓2，最后在再下一轮被减缓1。 @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 4}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 3}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2}

等级（+1）： 伤害增加1d6。

Absorb Element.name: 元素吸收 Absorb Element
Absorb Element.description: 你吸收一个与你相关的元素，或者以你元素为弱点的元素相关的持续法术或威能，并用它来刷新你的威能。选择一个具有你元素或你元素克制元素相关特征的持续法术或威能，该法术或威能必须在你周围60英尺内处于激活状态。然后，尝试对该法术或威能进行反制检定，使用你的威能DC-10作为反制修正，以及你等级的一半（向上取整）作为反制等级。无论你的反制检定是否成功，你仍然会吸取一些能量，并且你会刷新你的威能。该法术或威能在24小时内对你的“元素吸收”能力免疫。

Addling Blast.name: 混乱爆炸 Addling Blast
Addling Blast.description:
你释放出一股精神能量的锥形冲击波，以迷惑你的敌人的思维并使他们失去警惕。你对15英尺锥形区域内的所有敌人造成2d4+1点精神伤害，具体效果取决于他们的意志豁免。@Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))[mental]] a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]@Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

5级：使用“混乱爆炸”时，你可以选择将锥形区域的大小增加到20英尺，之后每提升4级，锥形区域的大小可以再增加5英尺，最高可达17级时的35英尺。 @Template[type:cone|distance:20] @Template[type:cone|distance:35]{35 feet}

大成功：生物不受影响。

成功： 生物受到一半伤害，并且直到其下一个回合开始之前处于“措手不及”状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}

失败： 生物受到全部伤害，并且直到你的下一个回合结束之前处于“呆滞1”和“措手不及”状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}

大失败： 生物受到双倍伤害，并且直到你的下一个回合结束之前处于“呆滞2”和“措手不及”状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}

等级（+1）： 伤害增加1d4。

等级（+2）： 伤害增加1。

Aegis of Immortal Stone.name: 不朽石盾 Aegis of Immortal Stone
Aegis of Immortal Stone.description:
你用几乎坚不可摧的土石护盾将自己包围起来。直到你下一个回合开始之前，你获得+2环境加值，提升你的AC（护甲等级）、反射豁免和强韧豁免，并且获得等于你等级四倍的物理伤害抗性（不包括精金）。在你下一个回合开始时，如果护盾的效果没有被触发（没有任何攻击命中你，你没有尝试过反射或强韧豁免，并且你从未受到过伤害），那么次级效果会持续存在。

你获得+1环境加值，提升你的AC（护甲等级）、反射豁免和强韧豁免，并且获得等于你等级的物理伤害抗性（不包括精金），这个效果将持续到护盾效果首次触发，或者直到你刷新技能，以先到者为准。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.NxkjDZeTAH7EfQsL]{Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone}

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.pjjAa7XPeo7nRVsg]{Effect: Aegis of Immortal Stone (Lingering)}

Aerial Trail.name: 风之轨迹 Aerial Trail
Aerial Trail.description:
你借助风力在敌人之间快速穿梭，留下风之利刃，任何敢于踏入你路径的生物都将被斩击。你可以连续移动两次，在此期间你可以穿过被敌人占据的空间，并在你的路径上的每个空间留下风之利刃的轨迹。直到你下一个回合结束，进入这些轨迹空间的生物将受到8d6的斩击伤害。一个生物即使进入多个来自你轨迹的方格，也只受到一次斩击伤害，如果它没有进入你的轨迹方格，即使它起始于你的轨迹方格，也不会受到伤害。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[slashing]]

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Anvil Crawler Lightning.name: 蛛状闪电 Anvil Crawler Lightning
Anvil Crawler Lightning.description:
闪电以蜘蛛爪般的细枝末节扩散，形成一个锥形区域，对区域内的生物造成电击并使其带电。你对一个30英尺锥形区域内的所有生物造成6d4电击伤害，目标需要进行一次基础强韧豁免。豁免失败的敌人将陷入电震状态，直到你的下一个回合结束。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[electricity]] @Template[type:cone|distance:30] @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} 选择以下一种效果：

  • 你自身获得充电状态。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • 你释放电能，将伤害提升至6d8电击伤害。如果你选择释放电能，你还可以将影响范围扩大至最大60英尺锥形区域。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]]@Template[type:cone|distance:60].

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, or 1d8 on discharge.

Aqua Punch.name: 水流拳 Aqua Punch
Aqua Punch.description:
你用一股水流对敌人发起攻击。对处于你触及范围内的一个敌人进行一次近战威能攻击投掷，造成3d6钝击伤害。@Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll} @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]]

攻击的效果取决于你的攻击投掷结果，以及你正处于高潮还是低潮状态。

High Tide: 伤害为1d10钝击伤害。@Damage[(@actor.level)d10[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power]

Low Tide: 你可以对30英尺内的一个目标进行近战攻击投掷，或者选择处于你触及范围内的目标，两者取其优。攻击的起始点可以是你选择的30英尺内的一个方格。你仍然不能对处于完全掩体后的目标使用水流拳，且你需要对攻击的起始点有直线效果，但这可能允许水流拳忽略其他类型的掩体，或者通过从不同方向攻击来夹击目标。如果攻击成功，目标在1轮内对你发起的攻击投掷将受到–1环境减值；如果攻击大成功，则目标受到–2环境减值。

Critical Success 你造成双倍钝击伤害，并且将目标移动20英尺。

Success 你造成正常的钝击伤害，并且将目标移动10英尺。

Failure 你没有伤害目标，但水流的冲击会移动他们，除非他们保持平衡以避免被移动。目标可以选择让你将他们移动5英尺，或者保持平衡，直到你的下一个回合结束，他们都将处于措手不及状态。 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}

Critical Failure 你的拳头完全落空，目标不受影响。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.U2aMUOhRLnZOOZUs]{Effect: Aqua Punch}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d10 on high tide.

Aqueous Embrace.name: 水流环 Aqueous Embrace
Aqueous Embrace.description:
你用一波波的水流将自己包围，将接触到你的敌人推拉。直到你再次刷新技能，你可以移动那些对你进行近战攻击并命中你的生物，以及那些触摸你或用徒手攻击命中你的生物，这取决于它们的强韧豁免结果。@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

与其他大多数水系技能不同，水拥之抱的效果并不取决于你使用技能时的潮汐状态，而是根据你当前的潮汐状态每次使用技能时都会改变。你的潮汐状态在使用水拥之抱时仍然会改变。

Critical Success 生物不受影响。

Success 生物不会移动。如果你处于低潮，且该生物已经与你相邻，它将受到等于你等级一半的钝击伤害。@Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))[bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning damage}

Failure 你可以将生物移动最多10英尺。如果你处于低潮，且该生物已经与你相邻，它将受到等于你等级的钝击伤害。@Damage[(@actor.level)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Critical Failure 你可以将生物移动最多20英尺。如果你处于低潮，且该生物已经与你相邻，它将受到双倍于你等级的钝击伤害。@Damage[(2*@actor.level)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Arboreal Curtain.name: 林木帷幕 Arboreal Curtain
Arboreal Curtain.description:
你在战场上召唤出一片由荆棘和木头组成的帷幕，穿透那些穿过它的生物。你可以在120英尺范围内创造出一道厚5英尺、高10英尺、长60英尺的直线荆棘帷幕。该帷幕提供标准掩护。任何穿过帷幕或在回合开始时处于帷幕区域内的生物将受到6d6穿刺伤害。帷幕将持续到你再次刷新技能。@Template[type:line|distance:60]{60 feet long} @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[piercing]]

一个生物在每个回合中只能从林木帷幕受到一次穿刺伤害，即使它在回合开始时处于帷幕内，然后穿过帷幕，或者多次穿过帷幕也是如此。

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: 你在该区域播种，创造出如此密集的荆棘和植物，使得该区域变成极度困难地形，而不是通常播种时的困难地形。

  • Harvest: 你在该区域收割，使得荆棘造成流血效果，因为帷幕提供了更多的掩护。帷幕提供高级掩护，而不是标准掩护。如果一个生物穿过帷幕并至少通过一个收割过的方格，他们还会受到1d6流血伤害。这种持续流血伤害在13级时增加到1d8，在17级时增加到1d10。 @Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]]@Damage[1d8[persistent,bleed]]@Damage[1d10[persistent,bleed]]

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Areadbhair.name: 阿瑞德布赫尔 Areadbhair
Areadbhair.description:
你召唤出一柄传说中的阳光之矛，它会穿透你的敌人，除非他们有决心抵抗。所有处于一个宽15英尺、长500英尺的直线上的敌人将被耀眼的光芒烧灼，受到20d8火焰伤害，这取决于敌人的DC 0意志豁免。@Template[type:line|distance:500|width:15]{15-foot wide line up to 500 feet long} @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[fire]] @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success 敌人不受影响。

Success 敌人受到一半伤害，并且直到你的下一个回合结束时处于眩目（Dazzled）和轮廓鲜明（Limned）状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}

Failure 敌人受到全部伤害，并且直到你的下下个回合结束（即持续2轮，然后直到你的回合结束）处于眩目和轮廓鲜明状态。

Critical Failure 敌人受到双倍伤害，并且永久失明（Blinded），即使它移除或避免了永久失明，也会在1分钟内处于眩目状态，并且轮廓鲜明持续1分钟。 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Avalanche.description:
你召唤出一场无尽的雪崩，它将掩埋该区域，击倒敌人，同时为你的盟友提供一点掩护。雪崩填充了你周围30英尺内的一个20英尺爆发区域。除了你和你的盟友之外，进入或在该区域内开始其回合的生物将受到17d4钝击伤害。如果你或你的盟友在该区域内，你们将不会受到雪崩的伤害，而是获得微弱掩护，给予+1环境加值的AC。雪崩将持续到你再次刷新。@Template[type:burst|distance:20]@Damage[(@actor.level)d4[bludgeoning]]

一个生物在每个回合中只能从雪崩受到一次钝击伤害，即使它在回合开始时处于该区域内，然后再次进入该区域也是如此。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.
Avalanche.name: 雪崩 Avalanche

Backlash Gust.name: 反冲强风 Backlash Gust
Backlash Gust.description:
你向前方发射一股带有风刃的气流，并借助反冲力退到安全位置。你对20英尺直线范围内的所有生物造成2d6斩击伤害，目标需要进行一次基础反射豁免。随后，你可以向直线的相反方向移动最多20英尺。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[slashing]] @Template[type:line|distance:20]@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

在5级时，你可以选择将直线的长度增加到30英尺，并向后移动最多30英尺。此后每提升4个等级，你可以将直线的长度和向后移动的距离各增加10英尺，到17级时最大可达到60英尺。@Template[type:line|distance:30]

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Ball Lightning.name: 球状闪电 Ball Lightning
Ball Lightning.description:
你创造出持续数秒的闪电球，而不是仅仅瞬间即逝，然后将它们投向附近的敌人。选择距离你30英尺内的最多四个不同的敌人。你向每个选定的敌人投掷闪电球，对每个目标造成5d12电击伤害，这取决于你对每个目标单独进行的远程威能攻击投掷结果，每次攻击都应用你的多重攻击减值，但在进行所有投掷后才应用。@Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d12[electricity]] @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack rolls} 选择以下一种效果：

  • 你自身获得充电（Charged）状态。 @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • 你释放电能，将伤害提升至10d10电击伤害。如果你选择释放电能，你可以将目标数量增加到60英尺内的最多八个敌人。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[electricity]]

Critical Success 敌人受到双倍电击伤害，并在2轮内处于电震（Shocked）状态。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked}

Success 敌人受到全额电击伤害，并在1轮内处于电震状态。

Failure 敌人受到1+等级点电击伤害。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)[electricity]] damage.

Critical Failure 攻击未命中。

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d12

Become the Shadow.name: 化为暗影 Become the Shadow
Become the Shadow.description: 你与黑暗和阴影融为一体，重新排列它们以刷新你的黑暗威能。你刷新了你的威能。然后，直到你的下一个回合结束，你处于隐匿3（Shrouded 3）状态。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 3}

Bewitching Meme.name: 魅惑迷因 Bewitching Meme
Bewitching Meme.description:
你在锥形区域内传播一种自我复制的心理过程，使你的敌人对你着迷。你对40英尺锥形区域内的所有敌人造成8d4 + 4心灵伤害，具体效果取决于他们的意志豁免。@Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))[mental]] @Template[type:cone|distance:40]@Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success 敌人不受影响。

Success 敌人受到一半伤害，并在1轮内对你着迷，尽管任何敌对行动都会像往常一样结束着迷状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}

Failure 敌人受到全额伤害，并在1轮内对你着迷。与通常情况不同，只有针对受影响的敌人的敌对行动才会结束着迷，而不是针对该敌人的盟友的敌对行动。

Critical Failure 敌人受到双倍伤害，并在1轮内对你着迷。与通常情况不同，敌对行动不会提前结束着迷状态。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.

Blazing Embrace.name: 烈焰拥抱 Blazing Embrace
Blazing Embrace.description:
你将自己包围在火焰之中，以此焚烧那些敢于攻击你的生物。直到你再次刷新技能，与你相邻的生物如果对你进行近战攻击并命中，以及那些触摸你或用徒手攻击命中你的生物，将受到等于你等级的火焰伤害和等于你等级一半的持续火焰伤害。

@Damage[(@actor.level)[fire],(floor(@actor.level/2))[persistent,fire]]

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1.

Level (+2) The persistent damage is increased by 1.

Blinding Brilliance.description:
You emanate an intense light that dazzles or blinds those around you. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[fire]] damage, to each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60], with results depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half fire damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The creature takes full fire damage and is dazzled and limned until the end of your turn after next (for 2 rounds and then until the end of your turn).

Critical Failure The creature takes double fire damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until the end of your next turn and dazzled and limned until the end of your turn after next (for 2 rounds and then until the end of your turn).

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.
Blinding Brilliance.name: Blinding Brilliance

Blinding Flash.name: Blinding Flash
Blinding Flash.description:
Trigger A foe within 30 feet targets you or an ally within 30 feet with a hostile action.

You create a brilliant flash of light, attempting to momentarily blind your foe and interfere with their ability to target you or your ally. The result depends on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for the triggering action.

Failure The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for the triggering action.

Critical Failure The foe is blinded until the beginning of its next turn.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.description:
You conjure a glacial blizzard that freezes over all those within. The blizzard fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Foes that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[cold]] damage and are @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 2}. The storm lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes cold damage and becomes frozen from Blizzard once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Level (+2) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Boulder Smash.name: Boulder Smash
Boulder Smash.description:
You create a huge boulder attached to your body and smash a foe while using the boulder to block attacks. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll} against a foe within your reach, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[bludgeoning]] damage. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Critical Success You deal double damage to the target.

Success You deal normal damage to the target.

Failure The boulder doesn't connect directly, but a glancing blow deals the target @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[bludgeoning]].

Critical Failure The boulder misses completely.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8, or 1 on a failure.

Brain Blast.name: Brain Blast
Brain Blast.description:
You send a wave of mental energy blasting from your brain in all directions. You deal an amount of mental damage equal to @Damage[((1+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))d4+ceil(@actor.level/2))[mental]] damage, to all foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], with results depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage.

Failure The foe takes full damage and they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until their next turn.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Brain Death.name: Brain Death
Brain Death.description:
You send a signal to your foe's brain, telling it to shut down and potentially killing the foe outright. Choose a foe within 120 feet. The foe takes @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[mental]] damage, and their brain might shut down, depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of their next turn.

Failure The foe takes full mental damage, and is stupefied 1 until the end of their next turn and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as their brain begins to shut down for a brief instant.

Critical Failure The foe takes double mental damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until the end of their next turn and stunned for 1 round as their brain shuts down temporarily. They must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|traits:death,incapacitation] save against your power DC. On a failure, their body doesn't survive the process and they die, while on a success, their brain starts again and they suffer no further effect. This secondary effect is a death and incapacitation effect.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Bubble Swarm.description:
You form countless water bubbles as you refresh you powers, and they swarm in the direction of your tide, pushing your foes with them. You move foes within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] saves. You Refresh your powers, which allows you to change to your choice of high tide or low tide.

Low Tide: The bubbles gather around you, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.O5qAywGhFe9k89J4]{Effect: Bubble Swarm}

Success The foe is unaffected.

Failure You move the foe 10 feet.

Critical Failure You move the foe 20 feet.
Bubble Swarm.name: Bubble Swarm

Burn Out.name: Burn Out
Burn Out.description: You flare up your flames engulfing your foe, creating an incredible intense burn as the flames taper out. A creature within 60 feet that has persistent fire damage from your fire powers takes fire damage equal to four times the amount of that persistent fire damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save, and then the persistent fire damage ends.

Calamitous Deluge.name: Calamitous Deluge
Calamitous Deluge.description:
You pour down an unending deluge of water in an area, feeding off its own power to damage and reposition foes. The calamitous deluge fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Foes that start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d6)[bludgeoning]] damage and you move them 15 feet. The deluge lasts until you refresh.

High Tide: Instead of pushing away from you, when the deluge moves a creature, they are moved away from the center of the deluge. This is forced movement. The damage increases to @Damage[(@actor.level)d4[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage. However, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} as long as the deluge lasts.

Low Tide: Instead of pulling toward you, when the deluge moves a creature, they are moved toward the center of the deluge. This is forced movement. If there's not enough space near the center of the deluge, creatures nearer to the center move first, and others move as far as they can without being blocked. You and your allies are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while you're in the deluge, though other creatures aren't concealed to you.

Level (+1) The damage on high tide increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The normal damage increases by 1d6.

Cancel Life.name: Cancel Life
Cancel Life.description:
You gather so much death energy around you to refresh your death powers that you stifle the power of life. You Refresh your powers. Until your next turn, you can attempt to counteract any healing effects, effects that grant temporary Hit Points, or other effects that recover Hit Points such as fast healing and regeneration, as long as the effect is within 60 feet of you. You use half your level rounded up as your counteract level and your power DC – 10 as your counteract modifier.

On a successful counteract, you prevent the healing effect, the gaining of temporary Hit Points, or the recovery of Hit Points, though a non-healing effect might still grant a partial benefit.

For instance, if you counteracted a non-healing effect that granted temporary Hit Points and a status bonus, you would only prevent the temporary Hit Points, and the status bonus would remain.

Centripetal Barrage.name: Centripetal Barrage
Centripetal Barrage.description:
You circle around your foes in an irregular circuit, firing off thousands of wind blades into the center to destroy all creatures in an area defined by your own movements. Stride up to six times, ending your movement in the same space where you began if possible. The area surrounded by the path you took during your movement becomes a killing zone where the thousands of tiny wind blades overlap and rip through everything within. Creatures in that area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[slashing]], with a @Check[type:Reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. If your movement doesn't end in your original space (typically due to being disrupted, since you can't end elsewhere voluntarily) the wind blades turn loose and the killing zone is ruined.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Cerebral Shock.name: Cerebral Shock
Cerebral Shock.description:
You concentrate deeply and send out a mental pulse at a distance, damaging and stunning foes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] whose center is within 80 feet. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[mental]] damage to all foes in the area, with results depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Change Places!.name: Change Places!
Change Places!.description:
You surround yourself in a web formed of threads of force, damaging foes and repositioning them. You deal an amount of force damage equal to @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4 +ceil(@actor.level/2))[force]] damage, to all foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], with results depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save. Allies in the area don't take damage, and if they're willing, you can reposition them up to 10 feet.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage.

Failure The foe takes full damage and you can reposition them up to 5 feet.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and you can reposition them up to 10 feet.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.

Charybdis.name: Charybdis
Charybdis.description:
You bring forth a swirling titanic maelstrom of water in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] that draws foes in or spits them out. At the end of each of your turns, the maelstrom whips and howls, dealing @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d6[bludgeoning]] damage to each foe in the area, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] saves. The maelstrom lasts until you refresh.

High Tide: The damage is @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d10[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage, but the maelstrom makes you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} as long as it lasts.

Low Tide: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC as long as the maelstrom lasts.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.LOZSTFUALZeY9PBH]{Effect: Charybdis (Low Tide)}

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and you move them 10 feet.

Failure The foe takes full damage, and you move them 20 feet.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage, and you move them 40 feet.

Level (20th) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d10 on high tide.

Chilling Breath.name: Chilling Breath
Chilling Breath.description:
You breathe out a cone of frigid cold and snow that freezes those in its path. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[cold]] damage with effects depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 3}.

Failure The creature takes full damage is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 4}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 5}.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Cloak of Darkness.name: Cloak of Darkness
Cloak of Darkness.description:
You shroud yourself in a billowing cloak of darkness, damaging creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]. You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn, and the cloak deals an amount of cold damage equal to @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4+ceil(@actor.level/2))[cold]] damage to all creatures in the area, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. If you were already shrouded when you use Cloak of Darkness, you can increase the emanation up to 30 feet.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.

Cloudburst.name: Cloudburst
Cloudburst.description:
You call forth an enormous cloudburst, a sudden downpour of water, at a great range. The cloudburst pounds your foes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] within 500 feet, dealing @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d6)[bludgeoning]] damage to each foe in the area, depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

High Tide: The damage is @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d10)[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage but the sudden rush of water into the cloudburst knocks you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Low Tide: The cloudburst's water rushing toward you conceals you from foes. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and you move them 5 feet.

Failure The foe takes full damage and you move them 10 feet.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and you move them 20 feet.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d10 in high tide.

Cocytus.name: Cocytus
Cocytus.description:
Calling upon the glacial cold of a mythical frozen river, you submerge and entomb all nearby foes as the cold wails around them. All foes within 60 feet are affected depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} as long as it remains frozen by your ice powers. If it ever ends the frozen condition, it's no longer immobilized, even if you later give it the frozen condition again.

Failure As success, except the target is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 4} and as long as it remains immobilized by Cocytus, the only actions it can take are Interact actions to remove the frozen condition.

Critical Failure As success, except the target is frozen 6 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, and as long as it remains immobilized by Cocytus, the only actions it can take are Interact actions to remove the frozen condition.

Cognitive Chain.name: Cognitive Chain
Cognitive Chain.description:
You create a self-sustaining chain of harmful thoughts that bounce between targets, assaulting their minds. Choose a creature within 120 feet. The target takes @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[mental]] damage and might become stupefied, depending on its @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

On a critical success, the chain ends. Otherwise, the thoughtform spreads to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, spreads to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on, until a target critically succeeds or you run out of targets within range. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The target takes full mental damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The target takes double mental damage, and it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} until the end of your next turn and stupefied 1 until you refresh.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Cold Snap.name: Cold Snap
Cold Snap.description:
You snap your fingers and shatter the ice that was freezing a target, dealing them massive damage. Choose a foe with the frozen condition from your ice powers within 60 feet. The target takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[cold]] damage, plus additional damage equal to 2d6 × the value of creature's frozen condition, to a maximum of 20d6 additional damage if the creature is frozen 10 or more, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. Then their frozen condition ends.

At 11th level, the additional damage from the frozen condition increases to 2d8 × the value of creature's frozen condition.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6

Contagious Folly.name: Contagious Folly
Contagious Folly.description:
You infect a foe with a particular brand of foolishness that's surprisingly compelling and quickly spreads to those who hear its blathering. Choose a foe within 60 feet. They take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[mental]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

While stupefied by Contagious Folly, whenever that creature touches one of their allies or communicates with one of their allies, that ally also must attempt a Will save against Contagious Folly with a +2 circumstance bonus on their saving throw; a creature can only be affected by the same Contagious Folly once, even if their infectious ally touches them or attempts to communicate with them multiple times.

These allies aren't themselves contagious, and the contagious effect via communication has the linguistic trait (if their allies can't understand the inane things the infected foe is saying, they can't spread their folly that way).

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is stupefied 1 until you refresh.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until you refresh.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Coruscating Chain.name: Coruscating Chain
Coruscating Chain.description:
You create a chain of electricity, arcing between various targets. Choose a creature within 250 feet. You unleash a torrent of electricity at the creature, dealing @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[electricity]] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Unless the target critically succeeds at its Reflex save, choose a new target within 30 feet of the previous target, and repeat the process, using the same damage roll. Continue until you decide to stop or a target critically succeeds at its Reflex save. All targets must be within 30 feet of the previous target and within 250 feet of you, you can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[electricity]] damage. If you discharge, the targets can be within 500 feet of you and within 60 feet of the previous target.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d10 on discharge.

Coruscating Flash.name: Coruscating Flash
Coruscating Flash.description: You emanate a coruscating flash that dazzles nearby foes and sets the nearby lights spinning into a coordinated state. Foes within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn. You Refresh your powers.

Counter Element.name: Counter Element
Counter Element.description:
Trigger A creature within 60 feet attempts to use a spell or ability with an associated trait from an element weak to your element.

You call upon your elemental powers to counter your foe's use of an element where you have the advantage. Attempt a counteract check against the triggering spell or ability, using your power DC – 10 as your counteract modifier and half your level rounded up as your counteract level.

Creeping Dread.name: Creeping Dread
Creeping Dread.description:
You insinuate dread into your foe's mind, overcoming them with a rising sense of terror. Choose a foe within 60 feet. They take @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[mental]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Crushing Toss.name: Crushing Toss
Crushing Toss.description:
You throw an enormous unattended object or chunk of the scenery at your foes. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{power attack roll} against a foe within 300 feet, dealing @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]] damage and possibly crushing the foe, depending on your power attack roll.

As the careening chunk lands, all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around the target other than the target also take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

You can choose to target an empty square instead of a foe if you'd prefer all creatures in the emanation to make a basic Reflex save without a power attack roll for greater effect. The area in the emanation becomes difficult terrain until you refresh.

It's very unlikely that such a large chunk of scenery is entirely made of a special material, but in very rare circumstances where the surroundings are entirely built out of a special material, the GM might determine that the damage applies that special material.

Critical Success You crush your target completely with the enormous thrown object or scenery chunk. The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, and takes double damage.

Success You clobber your target. The target takes full damage and falls prone.

Failure You aim only well enough to catch the target with some of the effect. The target takes half damage.

Critical Failure You somehow miss the target despite throwing such a large object or chunk of the scenery, though you still might manage to affect other nearby creatures depending on their Reflex saves.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Danse Macabre.name: Danse Macabre
Danse Macabre.description:
You unleash a devastating dance of death, and the deathly dancers sweep around you, stealing the life from your foes. Foes within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[void]] damage, and they might be drained, depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature avoids the worst of the dance. It takes half damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is swept away in the dance. It takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is devastated by the dance. It takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Dark Cocoon.name: Dark Cocoon
Dark Cocoon.description:
You encase a foe in a cocoon of congealed darkness. Choose a foe within 60 feet. The target is affected depending on its @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save, and they take a –2 circumstance penalty to their Reflex save if they were already shrouded.

The cocoon sloughs away into liquid inky darkness if the target breaks free, and it otherwise lasts up to a maximum of 1 minute. While a foe is imprisoned in your dark cocoon, they're shrouded, with a value that depends on their save result.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target isn't fully trapped by the cocoon, though the clumps of darkness still hold them down. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until it either [[/act escape dc=resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]]{Escapes} against your power DC or succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:10] check to pull off the darkness clump by clump.

Failure The target is imprisoned completely within the cocoon. The target is immobilized and @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 2} until it Escapes against your power DC.

Critical Failure The target is imprisoned and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the clinging darkness. The target is restrained by the cocoon and @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 3} until it Escapes against your power DC.

Darkness From Below.name: Darkness From Below
Darkness From Below.description:
You call forth creeping darkness from below, which ascends in a pillar of midnight, devouring your foes. The pillar is a vertical cylinder with your choice of radius from 5 feet to 15 feet and your choice of height from 40 feet to 200 feet, and the pillar's bottom center must be within 200 feet of you, but the top or far side of the pillar can extend out of range.

You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[cold]] damage to each creature in the area, with results depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save. You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn, as the darkness creeps over you as well.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half cold damage.

Failure The creature takes full cold damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 2} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The creature takes double cold damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 3} until the end of your next turn.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Dazzling Double.name: Dazzling Double
Dazzling Double.description:
You form a duplicate out of light that helps you arrange your light power and protects you from harm. You Refresh your powers. A duplicate of light appears, lasting until the beginning of your next turn or until it's destroyed. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting your duplicate; the chances are 1 in 2 (1–3 on 1d6).

Once your duplicate is hit, it's destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys the duplicate but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit the duplicate, the duplicate is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. A creature that destroys the duplicate is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 2 rounds.

Dazzling Embrace.name: Dazzling Embrace
Dazzling Embrace.description: You surround yourself with dazzling sparkles that interfere with your foes' follow-up attacks and limn them with light. Until you refresh, adjacent foes that hit you with a melee attack, as well as foes that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, take @Damage[(@actor.level)[fire]] damage equal to your level and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} until the end of their next turn and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of their current turn. Foes that are already both limned and dazzled (potentially from hitting you previously with Dazzling Embrace) increase the fire damage they take by half your level to @Damage[ (floor(1.5*@actor.level))[fire]].

Death Blow.name: Death Blow
Death Blow.description:
You call upon the power of death to descend swiftly upon and slaughter a nearby foe. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[void]] damage to a foe within 60 feet, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Death Curse.name: Death Curse
Death Curse.description:
Trigger A foe's attack or ability reduces you to 0 Hit Points.

Bringing you closer to death is dangerous for your foes. Just before slipping into @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconsciousness}, phasing out, or dying, you utter a parting death curse. The triggering creature takes @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[void]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Deathstorm.description:
You call forth a storm of utter death, sweeping through an area and killing all those within. The deathstorm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Creatures that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[void]] damage. If this void damage kills the creature, it explodes in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] of void energy, dealing the same amount of damage to creatures in the area. The storm lasts until you refresh. A creature can only take void damage from Deathstorm once per round, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area, or is hit by several explosions.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
Deathstorm.name: Deathstorm

Deathtouch.name: Deathtouch
Deathtouch.description:
You touch a creature, sending that creature to the harsh embrace of death. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll} against a foe within your reach, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d10[void]] damage.

Critical Success Your touch welcomes the creature to death's embrace, dealing double void damage to the target.

Success Your touch brings the creature closer to death, dealing normal void damage to the target.

Failure The touch only manages to graze the creature's body, but even that is enough to cause harm. You deal @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[void]] void damage.

Critical Failure The touch misses completely, and the target is unharmed.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d10, or 1 on a failure.

Debilitating Spore Cloud.name: Debilitating Spore Cloud
Debilitating Spore Cloud.description:
You release an enormous cloud of spores that form prickly debilitating growths in contact with creatures, objects, and the ground, damaging foes and sapping away their strength. The spore cloud drifts across a burst with up to a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] centered within 120 feet. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: You sow in the area, creating prickly growths from the ground where you sow. In addition to the normal effects of sowing, the area is hazardous terrain, dealing @Damage[1[piercing]] damage for each square. If you harvest these prickly growths, creatures in a square with the growths are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.
  • Harvest: You harvest nearby plants and imbue them with the spores' sapping powers. Creatures in a space with harvested plants who succeed at their Fortitude save (but don't critically succeed) are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round. On a failure, they're enfeebled 2 for 1 round, and on a critical failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} for 1 round.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze
Deep Freeze.description:
You concentrate all your ice powers on a single creature within 60 feet, freezing it exceptionally deeply, depending on its @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature shakes most of the effect off but is still frozen 1.

Success The creature is partially frozen over, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 5}.

Failure The creature is significantly frozen over and becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 8} (since the frozen condition applies all at once, this can surpass the limit for combining frozen value from ice accumulation, but only to a maximum of 8).

Critical Failure The creature is not only frozen but chilled to the point that the cold dulls and slows its movements. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 2 rounds and frozen 8.

Defensive Shroud.name: Defensive Shroud
Defensive Shroud.description:
Trigger A foe hits you with an attack.

Just after being hit, you deploy a powerful shroud to prevent any follow-up attacks. You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 3} until the beginning of your next turn.

Deteriorating Stream.name: Deteriorating Stream
Deteriorating Stream.description:
You send a stream of deteriorating death energy, causing all before you to sicken and die. You deal @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[void]] damage to all creatures in a line up to @Template[type:line|distance:120]{120 feet}, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature resists the stream's deterioration entirely, and is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and takes a –1 status penalty to saving throws and AC until they spend a single action to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.cO3Ppp7rjS0oPypK]{Effect: Deteriorating Stream (Success)}

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 4}.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Detonate Charge.name: Detonate Charge
Detonate Charge.description:
You detonate and release a volatile surge of electrical energy from a charged or shocked creature, damaging the creature and all those nearby. Choose a @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} foe within 60 feet. The target's electric charge surges through their body, dealing them @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d12[electricity]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

You can choose how the electricity releases, with an emanation of at least @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet} and up to @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet}. All other creatures within the emanation take the electricity damage rolled against the target (before applying the target's saving throw, resistances, weaknesses, and so on), with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save, and they become shocked for 2 rounds on a failed save.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge, detonating your own charge rather than the charge on another creature. If you discharge, you can choose for the emanation to be up to @Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40 feet} and you center the emanation on yourself, not on a shocked foe. While you are the target, you don't deal damage to yourself, focusing the extra damage outward to deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[electricity]] damage to the other creatures in the emanation with a basic Reflex save, and they become shocked for 4 rounds on a failed save.

Level (+1) The damage on discharge increases by 1d10.

Level (+2) The normal damage increases by 1d12.

Devour Charge.name: Devour Charge
Devour Charge.description:
You draw in charge from nearby foes as you rearrange the elemental electricity in the area and refresh your powers. For each foe with the shocked condition within 30 feet, you can choose to devour their charge, causing them to take @Damage[(@actor.level)[electricity]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round, removing their shocked condition. If you devoured the charge from at least one foe, you become charged. You Refresh your powers.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Devour Flames.name: Devour Flames
Devour Flames.description:
You open your mouth and draw in nearby flames, refreshing your firepower as the flames swirl around you. Each foe within 30 feet of you suffering from persistent fire damage takes the persistent fire damage and then immediately attempts the normal flat check to remove the persistent fire damage.

Each other creature within 30 feet of you suffering from persistent fire damage takes no damage and immediately attempts a flat check to remove the persistent fire damage with the reduced DC from especially effective assistance. You Refresh your powers.

Devouring Light.name: Devouring Light
Devouring Light.description:
You call forth a devouring light that surrounds and consumes your foe. Choose a foe within 120 feet. The foe becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and takes @Damage[(@actor.level)[persistent,fire]] damage equal to your level, all depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half persistent fire damage and is limned while they have the persistent damage and dazzled until the end of your next turn or as long as they have the persistent damage, whichever is shorter.

Failure The foe takes full persistent fire damage and is dazzled and limned as long as they have the persistent fire damage. You and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the creature as long as it has the persistent fire damage.

Critical Failure The foe takes double persistent fire damage and is dazzled and limned as long as they have the persistent fire damage. You and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the creature as long as it has the persistent fire damage.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Dispersing Retreat.name: Dispersing Retreat
Dispersing Retreat.description:
Trigger You take damage from a hostile action

After being damaged, you disperse into air and retreat. You disperse your form into thin air and then Stride 25 feet, ignoring difficult and greater difficult terrain. If an effect is immobilizing you, Dispersing Retreat first attempts to counteract that effect, using your @Check[type:eldamon|options:counteract]{counteract modifier} and half your level rounded up as your counteract level. Because you are dispersed into air, most reactions (such as Reactive Strike) don't affect you during the movement, unless they could have an effect on ordinary air. At the end of your movement, you return to your normal form. Despite your form being akin to air, it doesn't squeeze or compress, so you can't fit through small gaps or other areas that a solid creature couldn't enter during your Stride.

Disrupting Gust.name: Disrupting Gust
Disrupting Gust.description:
You disrupt nearby foes with a widespread gust, knocking them off-balance enough to move past them safely. Foes in a @Template[type:cone|distance:25] take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[slashing]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save. At 7th level, you can choose to increase the size of the cone to a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], and every 4 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the cone by 5 additional feet, to a maximum of 45 feet at 19th level.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 2 rounds.

Failure The foe takes full damage, is off-guard for 2 rounds, and can't take reactions for 1 round.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage, is off-guard for 2 rounds, and can't take reactions for 2 rounds.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Disrupting Tremor.name: Disrupting Tremor
Disrupting Tremor.description:
Trigger A creature attempts to leave a square on the ground within your reach during a move action it's using.

You create a tremor to disrupt your foe's movement, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The triggering creature powers through with its movement and is unaffected by your tremor.

Success The space within your reach is greater difficult terrain for the triggering creature until the end of the triggering move action.

Failure You disrupt the triggering creature's movement.

Critical Failure You disrupt the triggering creature's movement, and the creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Disruptive Impulse.name: Disruptive Impulse
Disruptive Impulse.description:
You seize control of all the forces nearby, rearranging them to refresh your powers and wreak havoc with your foes' movement. You Refresh your powers.

Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever a foe within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] of you begins a move action other than a Step, they must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save, with the following effects.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success You reposition the foe 5 feet just before it moves.

Failure You reposition the foe 10 feet just before it moves.

Critical Failure You reposition the foe 20 feet just before it moves.

Distant Heave.name: Distant Heave
Distant Heave.description:
You concentrate all your force into moving a creature within 120 feet as far as you can, depending on its @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save. If the target is a willing ally, you can reposition them up to 80 feet without the need for a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success You reposition the creature up to 20 feet.

Failure The reposition the creature up to 40 feet.

Critical Failure You reposition the creature up to 80 feet.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
You drain the life force from a creature within 60 feet, weakening its fortitude. The results depend on its @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature's life force is unassailable, and the creature is unaffected.

Success You drain a bit of the creature's life force. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure You drain a substantial portion of the creature's life force. The creature takes void damage equal to twice its level and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure You drain a great deal of the creature's life force. The creature takes void damage equal to three times its level and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

Drifting Slash.name: Drifting Slash
Drifting Slash.description:
You drift forward on the wind, slashing through a foe as you go. Stride once, making a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack} against a foe within reach at any point of your movement, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[slashing]] damage, with results depending on your power attack roll. This movement doesn't trigger reactions based on movement, such as Reactive Strike.

Critical Success You deal double slashing damage.

Success You deal normal slashing damage.

Failure Your slash misses, but the nearby air current grazes the target, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[slashing]] damage.

Critical Failure The slash misses completely, and the target is unharmed.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8, or 1 on a failure.

Earthen Curtain.name: Earthen Curtain
Earthen Curtain.description:
You trace a curtain of dirt and soil across the battlefield, blocking off an area. You create a 5-foot thick curtain of earth up to 10 feet high and up to @Template[type:line|distance:60]{60 feet long in a straight line}, calling forth the curtain within 120 feet. The curtain is solid, preventing creatures from crossing it, though they can damage a 10 by 10 section of the curtain.

A gargantuan creature's Strikes damage two contiguous 10 by 10 sections of the curtain instead of one. Each curtain section has AC 10, Hardness 5, and Hit Points equal to twice your level, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. The curtain lasts until you refresh.

Earthen Maul.name: Earthen Maul
Earthen Maul.description:
You swing an enormous maul of earth in a wide swipe, rebuffing several foes and deflecting their attacks against you, and potentially nearby allies. Make @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{power attack rolls} against all foes within a @Template[type:cone|distance:20]. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]] damage, depending on the results of your power attack roll.

Critical Success You deal double damage to the foe, and you and allies within 20 feet of you gain greater cover against that foe until the beginning of your next turn. Allies' cover depends on their current position; allies who later move away from you lose the cover, and allies who move to within 20 feet after you used the power gain the cover.

Success You deal normal damage to the foe, and you and all allies within 20 feet of you gain standard cover against that foe until the beginning of your next turn. Allies' cover depends on their current position; allies who later move away from you lose the cover, and allies who move to within 20 feet after you used the power gain the cover.

Failure The swing is only a glancing blow against the foe, dealing 1 bludgeoning damage plus @Damage[@actor.level[bludgeoning]] damage for each level you have, and you gain standard cover against that foe until the beginning of your next turn.

Critical Failure The maul misses completely, though you still gain lesser cover against the foe until the beginning of your next turn.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1 on a failure.

Eclipsing Embrace.name: Eclipsing Embrace
Eclipsing Embrace.description:
You surround yourself with a slick layer of eclipsing darkness, which latches onto and enshrouds those who attack you, chilling them to the bone.

Until you refresh, adjacent foes that hit you with a melee attack, as well as foes that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, take @Damage[@actor.level[cold]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of their turn. While you're shrouded, the cold damage increases by half your level.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Electric Field.name: Electric Field
Electric Field.description:
You create a crackling electric field around you to envelop your foes in electricity. The electric field is an emanation with a radius of up to @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 feet}, or up to @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} underwater or on a large enough surface made entirely of metal or another conducting material. The field deals @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[electricity]] damage, to all foes in the area, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage. If you discharge, you can also increase the radius to be up to 30 feet, or up to @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} underwater or on a conductive surface.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, or 1d8 on discharge.

Electric Shot.name: Electric Shot
Electric Shot.description:
You shoot a jolting shot of electricity at a foe. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack roll} against a foe within 40 feet, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d4[electricity]] damage. Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage and increase the range to 80 feet.

At 7th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, your electric shot's range increases by 20 feet (40 feet if you discharge), to a maximum of 120 feet (240 feet if you discharge) at 19th level.

Critical Success You deal double electricity damage to the target.

Success You deal normal electricity damage to the target.

Failure The shot misses by a small margin, dealing the target @Damage[@actor.level[electricity]] damage. If the target is shocked, the shot swerves toward the target and jolts them slightly, dealing half damage instead.

Critical Failure The shot misses completely.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d4, damage on discharge increases by 1d8.

Electric Surge.name: Electric Surge
Electric Surge.description:
You send a surging current of electricity in front of you, shocking creatures in a line. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[electricity]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:20], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. Choose one:

  • You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged},
  • You discharge to increase the area to a @Template[type:line|distance:40] and the damage dice from d4s to @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[electricity]]{d8s}. 

At 5th level, you can choose to increase the size of the line to a 30- foot line when you use Electric Surge, and every 4 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the line by 10 additional feet (20 feet when discharging), to a maximum of 60 feet (or 120 feet when discharging) at 17th level.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Elemental Control.name: Elemental Control
Elemental Control.description:
Using your mastery over your element, you seize control of a creature within 60 feet with one of your element's corresponding traits, moving their body under your own power with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save (or @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save if your element is mind). This power has no effect on a creature that doesn't have one of your element's associated traits. Many eldamon and elemental avatars consider this power taboo, as it steals another creature's agency.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as its body fights off your control.

Failure You control the target. It gains the controlled condition until you Refresh, but it can attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the power ends.

Critical Failure As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you control it in a way that is completely against its nature, such as killing its allies.

Elemental Cover.name: Elemental Cover
Elemental Cover.description:
You quickly form a quasi corporeal barrier out of your element's energies. The barrier is up to 20 feet long and up to 5 feet high, with at least one square within 30 feet of you. As the barrier is quasi corporeal, creatures and attacks can pass through, but they're impeded when they do so.

Crossing the barrier is difficult terrain, and the barrier provides standard cover to Medium or smaller creatures and lesser cover to Large creatures. Creatures can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} behind the barrier as normal. If your element is intangible, like mind, life, or time, you can describe how your element's energies provide cover; for instance, perhaps time elemental energy throws off the timing of attacks. The barrier lasts until you Refresh.

Elemental Frenzy.name: Elemental Frenzy
Elemental Frenzy.description:
You lash out with elemental energy at everything within reach. Make @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack rolls} at every foe in your reach. Apply your multiple attack penalty for these attacks only after completing all of them.

You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[untyped]] damage of the type associated with your element, with effects depending on your power attack roll.

Critical Success The elemental energy overwhelms the foe, and the foe takes double damage.

Success The frenzied attack hits the foe for full damage.

Failure The elemental energy grazes the foe, and the foe takes @Damage[(1+@actor.level)[untyped]] damage.

Critical Failure The frenzied elemental attack misses the foe completely.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8, or 1 on a failure.

Elemental Lariat.name: Elemental Lariat
Elemental Lariat.description:
You draw upon the elemental energies that match your element in a foe within 30 feet in order to hold them in place, depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

This is fully effective only against foes that possess one of your element's traits. If the foe doesn't have the corresponding elemental trait, their saving throw result is one degree of success better than the result they rolled. If they don't have any corresponding elemental energies at all (usually only if they are a pure embodiment of a different element), Elemental Lariat instead has no effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds or until it Escapes against your power DC, whichever comes first.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 2 rounds or until it Escapes against your power DC, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}, and it's immobilized for 2 rounds or until it Escapes against your power DC, whichever comes first.

Elemental Protection.name: Elemental Protection
Elemental Protection.description: You infuse yourself and nearby allies with the protection of your element. Your allies within 30 feet gain resistance equal to your level to your element's associated traits. You increase the resistance to those traits from being an eldamon or from the elemental avatar Elemental Defense feat (if any) by your level; if you don't have resistance to your element's traits from one of those sources, you gain resistance equal to your level instead. These resistances last until you Refresh.

Elemental Rocket.name: Elemental Rocket
Elemental Rocket.description:
Using your elemental energies, you rocket yourself up to 30 feet in a straight line directly toward a foe, slamming into them and ending your movement adjacent to the foe. While your elemental energy propels you, your body collides with the foe, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]] damage with effects depending on your @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll}.

If your body is unusually pointy or covered in needles, such as if you're an elecupine, the GM might determine that Elemental Rocket deals piercing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

Because only you are affected by your own element, as it rockets you forward, creatures' resistances, weakness, and immunities to your element don't apply against Elemental Rocket, though any resistances, weaknesses, or immunities to bludgeoning (or piercing if applicable) affect Elemental Rocket's damage as normal.

Critical Success You slam tremendously hard into the foe, dealing double damage.

Success You slam into the foe with a direct hit, dealing full damage.

Failure You slam into the foe, but the impact is at an awkward angle and barely hurts them. You deal @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Critical Failure You not only miss your foe completely, you also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} at the end of your movement.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1 on a failure.

Elemental Shot.name: Elemental Shot
Elemental Shot.description:
You shoot an arrow, bullet, or ray of elemental matter or energy at a foe from a distance. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack roll} against a foe within 60 feet, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[untyped]] damage of the type associated with your element, with effects depending on your attack roll.

Critical Success You deal double damage to the target.

Success You deal normal damage to the target.

Failure Your shot barely grazes the target, dealing @Damage[(1+(floor(@actor.level/2)))[untyped]] damage.

Critical Failure Your shot misses completely.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1 on a failure.

Elemental Supremacy.name: Elemental Supremacy
Elemental Supremacy.description:
Trigger A creature within 100 feet attempts to use a spell or ability with an associated trait from your element.

When your foes dare to trespass upon your element, you show them who truly embodies it. Attempt a counteract check against the triggering spell or ability, with a counteract level equal to half your level rounded up, and a counteract modifier equal to your spell DC – 10. On a success, you make all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell or ability, as though you were the spell's caster or ability's user.

The spell or ability origin doesn't change; it still comes from the actual caster or user, you simply alter the decisions being made to suit your own whims. For instance, if you took control of a line or cone spell, it would still originate from the spell's caster, but you could aim the line or cone at a different angle of your choice, perhaps hitting the caster's allies instead of your own.

Elysium.name: Elysium
Elysium.description:
Calling upon the powerful life force of ancient heroes, you transform your surroundings into a beautiful glowing field. The area on the ground within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] becomes an Elysian field until you refresh or for 4 rounds, whichever comes first. You and your living allies don't take damage from hazardous terrain in the Elysian field, and instead, you and your living allies regain @Damage[20[healing]] Hit Points when starting a turn in the area.

A creature who recovers at least 1 Hit Point in this way gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until their next turn. The area is hazardous terrain to undead, dealing @Damage[5[vitality]] damage for every square that the undead enters.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.6O1N7lCkbQL5F9eU]{Effect: Elysium}

Embrace the Dark.name: Embrace the Dark
Embrace the Dark.description: You embrace the darkness around you in order to refresh your darkness powers. You Refresh your powers and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn. You [[/act hide]], then [[/act sneak]].

Enduring Force Storm.name: Enduring Force Storm
Enduring Force Storm.description:
You set a storm of force swirling in an area, feeding off its own power to damage and reposition foes. The force storm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Foes that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[force]] damage and you can reposition them 5 feet. You can also reposition allies that start their turn in the area 5 feet, but they don't take damage.

A creature only takes force damage from Enduring Force Storm once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area. The storm lasts until you refresh.

Level (+2) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Fade Into Darkness.name: Fade Into Darkness
Fade Into Darkness.description: You fade completely into the darkness. You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 3} until you refresh or until some other effect ends your shrouded condition, whichever comes first.

Fan of Flames.name: Fan of Flames
Fan of Flames.description:
You call forth a fan of flames, blazing through nearby foes and spreading fires. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[fire]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

If any creatures in the cone are taking persistent fire damage from your fire powers, they spread that persistent fire damage to all other creatures in the cone that are farther away from you unless they critically succeed at their Reflex save.

At 5th level, you can choose to increase the size of the cone to a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] when you use Fan of Flames, and every 4 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the cone by 5 additional feet, to a maximum of 35 feet at 17th level.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Fastball Special.name: Fastball Special
Fastball Special.description:
Using force, you throw one of the most dangerous things in the area at your foe… your own ally, weapon first! You move a willing ally within 60 feet directly toward a foe within 120 feet until the foe is within your ally's melee reach (if your ally has more than 5 feet of reach, you can choose how far to throw them).

At the end of the movement, your ally makes a melee Strike against the target as a free action, adding @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[force]] damage on a success depending on the foe's @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save (like most additional damage, this additional force damage is doubled on a critical hit). If your ally's Strike is a failure, but not a critical failure, you still deal that additional force damage as your ally lands near the foe with a shockwave of force. On a critical failed attack roll, your ally falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Since you are moving an ally and not a foe, this movement isn't forced movement.

Critical Success Your ally doesn't deal any additional force damage with their Strike.

Success Your ally deals half the additional force damage.

Failure Your ally deals full force damage.

Critical Failure Your ally deals double the additional force damage.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Fated Quietus.name: Fated Quietus
Fated Quietus.description:
You tap into the magical energy surrounding a creature's death, increasing the odds that they're slain by a given methodology. Choose a creature within 60 feet. It gains weakness equal to half your level (rounded up) to a single damage type of your choice (not a larger grouping of damage types like "physical" or "all"), depending on its @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature gains the weakness for 1 round.

Failure The creature gains the weakness for 3 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature gains weakness up to your level (instead of half your level) for 3 rounds. Effects that deal the chosen damage type gain the death trait against the creature, causing them to kill the creature if they reduce it to 0 Hit Points.

Fimbulvetr.name: Fimbulvetr
Fimbulvetr.description:
You surround yourself with the great eternal winter of an ice age, juxtaposing the world with the wellspring of elemental cold and freezing all those who oppose you in an extraordinarily wide area. All creatures you choose within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:500] take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[cold]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 3}.

Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 5}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 7}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Fire Whirl.name: Fire Whirl
Fire Whirl.description:
You swirl flames around you in an incendiary fire whirl, swerving around your allies. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[fire]] damage, as well as @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))[persistent,fire]]{persistent fire} damage equal to half your level, to all foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Level (+1) The normal damage increases by 1d6.

Firestorm.name: Firestorm
Firestorm.description:
You conjure a blazing firestorm that rages across the area, searing all those unlucky enough to remain inside. The firestorm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Creatures that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[fire]] damage. The storm lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes fire damage from Firestorm once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Fissure.name: Fissure
Fissure.description:
